languages.text: "Я хочу поверить в твои слова... И это указывает, что я слаба, испорчена. Я не желаю своей недостойностью еще больше опорочить имя госпо{mf|дина|жи}. Отрекись от меня".
"I want to believe your words. And that is proof of my weakness, my corruption. I do not wish to besmirch my {mf|master|mistress}'s name further with my unworthiness. You must disown me, Domin."
languages.original_text: "Я хочу поверить в твои слова... И это указывает, что я слаба, испорчена. Я не желаю своей недостойностью еще больше опорочить имя госпо{mf|дина|жи}. Отрекись от меня".

traits.locale_text: "I want to believe your words. And that is proof of my weakness, my corruption. I do not wish to besmirch my {mf|master|mistress}'s name further with my unworthiness. You must disown me, Domin."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: «Quiero creerle. Y eso demuestra mi debilidad, la corrupción que hay en mí. No deseo mancillar el buen nombre de mi maestr{mf|o|a} con mi falta de valía. Debe deshacerse de mí, Domin».
languages.original_text: "I want to believe your words. And that is proof of my weakness, my corruption. I do not wish to besmirch my {mf|master|mistress}'s name further with my unworthiness. You must disown me, Domin."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero creerle. Y eso demuestra mi debilidad, la corrupción que hay en mí. No deseo mancillar el buen nombre de mi maestr{mf|o|a} con mi falta de valía. Debe deshacerse de mí, Domin».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: 「あなた様の言葉を信じたい。こう思うことこそ私が弱くて穢れている証です。この不甲斐なさで、これ以上あなた様の名を汚したくありません。私との関係はここまでにすべきです、ドミン」
languages.original_text: "I want to believe your words. And that is proof of my weakness, my corruption. I do not wish to besmirch my {mf|master|mistress}'s name further with my unworthiness. You must disown me, Domin."

traits.locale_text: 「あなた様の言葉を信じたい。こう思うことこそ私が弱くて穢れている証です。この不甲斐なさで、これ以上あなた様の名を汚したくありません。私との関係はここまでにすべきです、ドミン」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: “我愿意相信你的话，但这恰恰证明了我的软弱、我的堕落。我决不能让我的失败进一步玷污秘者的圣名，你必须在此将我舍弃，秘者。”
languages.original_text: "I want to believe your words. And that is proof of my weakness, my corruption. I do not wish to besmirch my {mf|master|mistress}'s name further with my unworthiness. You must disown me, Domin."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意相信你的话，但这恰恰证明了我的软弱、我的堕落。我决不能让我的失败进一步玷污秘者的圣名，你必须在此将我舍弃，秘者。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: "Ich will Euren Worten glauben. Allein das beweist meine Schwäche, meine Verderbtheit. Ich will den Namen {mf|meines Meisters|meiner Meisterin} nicht länger mit meiner Unwürdigkeit beflecken. Ihr müsst mich verstoßen, Domin."
languages.original_text: "I want to believe your words. And that is proof of my weakness, my corruption. I do not wish to besmirch my {mf|master|mistress}'s name further with my unworthiness. You must disown me, Domin."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will Euren Worten glauben. Allein das beweist meine Schwäche, meine Verderbtheit. Ich will den Namen {mf|meines Meisters|meiner Meisterin} nicht länger mit meiner Unwürdigkeit beflecken. Ihr müsst mich verstoßen, Domin."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: « Je ne demande qu'à vous croire, et c'est bien la preuve de ma faiblesse, de la corruption qui me ronge. Je refuse de souiller davantage le nom de {mf|mon maître|ma maîtresse} par mon indignité. Vous devez me désavouer, Domin. »
languages.original_text: "I want to believe your words. And that is proof of my weakness, my corruption. I do not wish to besmirch my {mf|master|mistress}'s name further with my unworthiness. You must disown me, Domin."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne demande qu'à vous croire, et c'est bien la preuve de ma faiblesse, de la corruption qui me ronge. Je refuse de souiller davantage le nom de {mf|mon maître|ma maîtresse} par mon indignité. Vous devez me désavouer, Domin. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: "Sözlerine inanmak istiyorum. Bu da zayıflığımın, maruz kaldığım durumun bir kanıtı. Değersizliğimle efendimin ismine daha fazla leke sürmek istemiyorum. Beni kovmalısın Domin."
languages.original_text: "I want to believe your words. And that is proof of my weakness, my corruption. I do not wish to besmirch my {mf|master|mistress}'s name further with my unworthiness. You must disown me, Domin."
